MacroOp.Name: OMNI_THREAD_YIELD
MacroOp.Brief: A helper macro calling the platform thread yield function.
MacroOp.Description: Calling this macro will call the underlying function to yield the current thread to others based on the current thread schedule policy. This macro is called by the omni::sync::yield_thread function as well.
MacroOp.PlatformSpecific: Defined as #define OMNI_THREAD_YIELD() ::SwitchToThread() on Windows platforms and #define OMNI_THREAD_YIELD() ::sched_yield() on others.
MacroOp.Synopsis: Calls the platform thread yield function to yield the current thread.
